the activity of searching and finding out about something: exploration of Livingstone was the first European to make an exploration of the Zambezi river (= to travel to it in order to discover more about it). We need to carry out a full exploration (= examination) of all the alternatives.exploration for The exploration (= search) for new sources of energy is vital for the future of our planet. undersea/underwater exploration
